messages.msgSnippet: To whom it may concern, I would like to let everyone know that we have started a new study group on Long Island, NY.  If some of you would be so kind to add
messages.messageBody:
To whom it may concern,

I would like to let everyone know that we have started a new study group
on Long Island, NY. If some of you would be so kind to add our link to
"Links pages" available from some of your web sites and or just pass the
information around, it would be greatly appreciated. If you have any
questions, please feel free to contact me kenzento@....

www.litokenkai.com

Regards,

Moses Becerra




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
